src:
MU Incar Partizan Belgrade Sebagai Momentum Kebangkitan
06 Nov 2019, 16:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gelandang Manchester United, Fred meminta timnya untuk mempersiapkan diri dengan baik jelang pertandingan melawan Partizan Belgrade. Fred menyebut timnya harus menang di laga ini untuk kembali ke jalur kemenangan.
Manchester United akan menggelar pertandingan keempat Liga Europa pada tengah pekan nanti. Mereka akan menjamu wakil Serbia, Partizan Belgrade di Old Trafford.
United sendiri baru-baru ini mendapatkan hasil yang kurang baik. Mereka tumbang 1-0 di markas Bournemouth, sehingga tren kemenangan mereka terhenti.
Fred sendiri berharap timnya bisa kembali ke jalur kemenangan pada pertandingan ini. "Saya rasa yang terpenting bagi kami adalah meraih kemenangan," buka Fred kepada situs resmi Manchester United.

Baca komentar lengkap sang gelandang di bawah ini.
text:
MU Aims Partizan Belgrade as the Momentum of Awakening
Nov 6 2019, 16:20 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester United midfielder Fred asks his team to prepare well ahead of the match against Partizan Belgrade. Fred said his team must win this fight to get back to winning ways.
Manchester United will hold their fourth Europa League match in the middle of the week. They will host the Serbian representative, Partizan Belgrade at Old Trafford.
United themselves have recently gotten poor results. They fell 1-0 at Bournemouth headquarters, so the trend of their victory stalled.
Fred himself hopes his team can get back to winning ways in this match. "I think the most important thing for us is to win," Fred told the official Manchester United website.

Read the midfielder's full comments below.
